act: Protection of Animals Act (1911) Amendment Act 1921
section_title: Amendment of Protection of Animals Act, 1911.
section_text: 1 The first section of the  Protection of Animals Act, 1911, subsection (3), paragraph (b), shall be amended by the addition thereto of the following words;  “            and a captive animal shall not be deemed to be coursed or hunted within the meaning of this subsection if it is coursed or hunted in an enclosed space from which it has no reasonable chance of escape.          ”

act: Protection of Animals Act (1911) Amendment Act 1921
section_text: 2 This Act may be cited as the Protection of Animals Act (1911) Amendment Act, 1921.
